title: TFR Focus Ep. 23: National Treasure(s), 5 Best Nic Cage Films
description:
On this special episode of TFR Focus, Chris and Matt are joined by Gomez of Playlist Wars to discuss one of his favorite actors and franchises, Nic Cage and National Treasure!  It’s guest’s choice this time as Gomez wants to breakdown Nic Cage and Disney’s National Treasure films.  Not only that, but then the guys tick off their 5 Favorite Nic Cage Performances! All this and more on the latest episode of The First Run Focus!

00:00-31:56: Intro/National Treasure

31:57-51:11: National Treasure: Book Of Secrets

51:12-1:16:49: 5 Best Nic Cage Roles

1:16:50-1:20:00: Wrap Up

Theme music by Jamal Malachi Ford-Bey

Twitter
